title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 111.9 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 111.9 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, there shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Part. (b) Copies of
records shall be provided at a rate which shall not exceed 25 cents per
photocopy up to 9 by 14 inches, or the actual cost of reproducing any other
record, except when a different fee is otherwise prescribed by
statute. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
111.9

Amended

New

York State Register October 21, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 42, eff. 10/21/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
